title: Put large content in text item, the tips shows the content in one line
description: INTRODUCTION 32. SOME OF THE ERROR MESSAGE DOESN'T HAVE ENOUGH INFORMATION FOR USER TO IDENTIFY THE ERROR. 42.5 ADD JAVASCRIPT OBJECT 42.6 SUPPORT DROP IN THE GROUP HEADER 42.7 PROVIDE UNDOABLE TRANSACTION 42.8 USER PROPERTY REVISION 52.9 HELP GUI TO FILTRATE THE UNNECESSARY NOTIFICATIONS 53. ELEMENT EXTENSION 65. Save and put mouse on the text itemExpected Result: tips show in given formatActual Result: tips show in one line
OB: When a large content is placed in a text item, the tips associated with the text item are displayed in a single line.
EB: The tips associated with the text item should be displayed in the given format, not as a single line.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Put a large content in a text item.
2. Save the text item.
3. Put the mouse on the text item and observe the tips.
